title: Write create-checkpoint.md command
description: Create command to capture current state before making changes. Determines files from task files_affected, generates checkpoint ID (chk-{task_id}-{sequence}), creates backup directory, copies files with hashing, captures task state, and reports checkpoint details.
notes: Created create-checkpoint.md command for capturing state before changes. Implements 7-step process: load task, generate checkpoint ID (chk-{task_id}-{sequence}), create backup directory, process files (hash + copy for existing, record metadata for new), capture task state, write checkpoint.json, report success. Includes error handling and integration with complete-task.md.
